category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_savemanager_catalog_comp_save_modes
preference.preference_description: List of keywords defining the available save modes for documents referenced in a catalog. Only save modes listed in this preference can be applied to documents referenced in a catalog. Possible values : CREATE = Create New and Save As New save modes are available COPY = Save As Copy save mode is available REVISE = New Revision save mode is available USE EXISTING ITEM = Use Existing Item save mode is available. Permits a new dataset to be created under and existing item. USE EXISTING DATASET = Use Existing Dataset save mode is available (to update a dataset under an existing item) EXISTING = Existing save mode is available
